answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.The most probable cause for the tingling sensation is neuropathy, a disorder of the nerves. Most common cause is diabetes. This happens with metabolic disorders, vitamin deficiencies, infections and traumatic injuries. The tingling need proper evaluation by your GP, please consult him for a neurological assessment.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.

question: i have a tingling sensation in my forehead, had it for a couple of weeks now, gradually getting worse
title: tingling sensation on forehead
